course_info.Course Title: Generative AI Model Development and Fine Tuning
Learning Outcomes: LO1: Implement generative models using deep learning algorithms and analyse their suitability for different problem requirements.
LO2: Preprocess and transform generative datasets using embeddings and tokenisation for model readiness.
LO3: Train generative AI models with neural optimisation techniques using benchmark datasets and performance metrics.
LO4: Identify model weaknesses through evaluation and propose targeted fine-tuning strategies for improvement.

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: Data preparation and preprocessing remain significant bottlenecks in AI implementation projects. Teams frequently struggle with data quality issues, inefficient tokenization processes, and inadequate embedding techniques, leading to poor model performance and extended development cycles.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: The course provides essential skills in data preprocessing and transformation techniques, ensuring participants can effectively prepare and optimize datasets for AI model training. This practical knowledge significantly reduces development time and improves the quality of AI implementations.
